titleStmt.title: An epistell exhortatorye, admonishing a[n]d warning all faithful Christia[n]s to beware of the false fained God of the aulter, and only to trust in the onelye lyuing God

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 20:18 as STC 5196 (number changed in STC 2nd ed. to 10430) and at reel 38:9 as STC (2nd ed.) 10430.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
